resources.string: The tilesets included here were made by other people, and have been made freely available online for use by the NetHack community. If you are the creator of one of these and wish for me to remove it from the distribution, or want to be credited differently, please contact me.
This tileset is included by permission from its creator, Chozo Abigaba. For more info and download, see www.multifoliate.com/nh/.
This is a variant of the Abigaba tiles, modified by kb, the author of this web page: www.multifoliate.com/nh/.
This tileset was created by John Shaw, and was originally available here: www.aesthetictech.8m.com/Absurd.htm See also nethack.wikia.com/wiki/The_Absurd_NetHack_Tileset for more information.

This is a slightly different version of the Absurd tileset which was found here: bilious.homelinux.org/~paxed/nethack/nhsshot/tileset/absurd32_nethack.png. The main difference I know about is that the walls are pictured straight from above, rather than at an angle.
RLTiles is a public domain graphical tileset for Roguelike games, available at: rltiles.sf.net.
